name: Office of Councilmember Eric Guerra (District 6)
notes: City Council representative for Tahoe Park and Tallac Village.

name: Office of Councilmember Caity Maple (District 5)
notes: City Council representative for Oak Park, Med Center, and Stockton Blvd.

name: Tahoe Park Neighborhood Association (TPNA)
notes: Volunteer board organizing 'Food Truck Nights', park cleanups, and scholarships.

name: Oak Park Neighborhood Association (OPNA)
notes: Historic association focusing on equity, housing, and historic preservation.

name: Stockton Boulevard Partnership
notes: PBID managing safety, cleanliness, and security on the Stockton corridor.

name: Tahoe Park (The Park)
notes: 29-acre park featuring a pool, softball fields, and walking loop. Neighborhood centerpiece.

name: McClatchy Park
notes: Historic park (formerly an amusement park) known for its distinct Joyland archway.

name: Colonial Heights Library
notes: Crucial community hub offering internet access, family programs, and cooling centers.

name: Sacramento Food Bank & Family Services
notes: Major provider of food access, clothing, and adult education for the region.

name: WellSpace Health - Oak Park
address: 3415 Martin Luther King Jr Blvd, Sacramento, CA 95817
notes: Community health center providing medical and dental care.
